【高普：佳尼傷咗，但唔會買替補】

高普在對士砵亭賽後交待佳尼傷勢，並指不會購入球員替補這位右閘：「當時佳尼以為自己只是普通撞傷。看上去很正常。」

「在所有傷病中，前十字韌帶是最不理想的受傷，但在前十前韌帶傷來說，他算是傷得較輕。他的十字韌帶沒有 100% 斷裂，他須做手術並須時間休息，但相信不會對他的職業生涯有大影響，但對他和球隊來說也不是好事。但這傷勢不會影響我們的轉會計劃。」

另外，高普亦透露張伯倫小腿受傷，更是近三場賽事中兩度手腿受傷。高普指這是張伯倫一直存在的問題，當比賽達致一定強度時，小腿便容易出現狀況。

致香港市民:

近月來，香港政府莫視民意強推逃犯條例修例，對香港市民５大訴求嗤之以鼻。而香港警察與黑社會勾結，屢屢對和平示威者使用過份武力，而７２１元朗暴亂則肆意放縱白衫暴徒。

在此，我們對香港政府及警方予以強烈譴責，並希望兩者能及早回頭，痛改前非，走回正軌，以至真至誠的心服務香港市民。

同時我們促請政府正面回應香港市民５大訴求：
1. 撤回逃犯條例
2. 撒回暴動定性
3. 撤銷所有抗爭者控罪
4. 追究警隊濫暴
5. 立即實行雙普選

我們會永遠站在香港市民一方，共同守護香港價值，守護香港這個家。
you will never walk alone！

光復香港，時代革命！
香港加油！

Time to look at today’s transfer rumours regarding the Reds.

PHILIPPE COUTINHO:
• You may have seen this go up yesterday, but if you missed it, fear not - Jürgen Klopp has outlined Liverpool’s stance on a possible Coutinho transfer.
• And if you were hoping a return for the Little Magician was on the cards, those hopes have been swiftly dashed by the boss.
• Jürgen Klopp has revealed Liverpool will not be trying to sign Philippe Coutinho from Barcelona this summer - or any big-money player for that matter.

BRUNO FERNANDES:
• Klopp has also done the same with Fernandes.
• Yesterday, when talking about the possibility of Fernandes moving to Manchester United, Klopp gave no impression that the Reds were interested in hijacking the switch.
• And given the boss’ transfer stance this summer, you can only assume Liverpool will not be signing the Sporting skipper.

GARETH BALE:
• Today is “Klopp quashing transfers” day.
• Speaking to Sky Sports, Jürgen Klopp explained why the Reds wouldn’t be interested in a deal for Bale, who is completely out of favour at Real Madrid.
• He said: “These fantastic football players have some strange ideas. I respect them all so much, but they probably only say these things because somebody asked them.
“Bale is a Real Madrid player and if he leaves it will be outstandingly expensive and big wages.
“He is an outstanding player, I like him a lot but it is not about him. You have to create a team. A team is not a collection of the best individual players, they have to work together.” TOM HEATON:
• Liverpool have been linked to Burnley goalkeeper Tom Heaton.
• The Daily Mail claim the Reds are interested in the shot-stopper although they will reportedly face competition from Aston Villa.
• However, with Simon Mignolet looking set to stay at Anfield it would appear this move is unlikely.

DANI CEBALLOS:
• Liverpool-linked Ceballos joined Arsenal today on a season-long loan.
• Despite numerous reports claiming the Reds were interested in the midfielder, it was unlikely a move would have been made by Klopp. 🔴 #LFC

• Jürgen Klopp has revealed Liverpool will not be trying to sign Philippe Coutinho from Barcelona this summer - or any big-money player for that matter.

BRUNO FERNANDES:
• Klopp has also done the same with Fernandes.
• Yesterday, when talking about the possibility of Fernandes moving to Manchester United, Klopp gave no impression that the Reds were interested in hijacking the switch.
• And given the boss’ transfer stance this summer, you can only assume Liverpool will not be signing the Sporting skipper.

GARETH BALE:
• Today is “Klopp quashing transfers” day.
• Speaking to Sky Sports, Jürgen Klopp explained why the Reds wouldn’t be interested in a deal for Bale, who is completely out of favour at Real Madrid.
• He said: “These fantastic football players have some strange ideas. I respect them all so much, but they probably only say these things because somebody asked them.
“Bale is a Real Madrid player and if he leaves it will be outstandingly expensive and big wages.
“He is an outstanding player, I like him a lot but it is not about him. You have to create a team. A team is not a collection of the best individual players, they have to work together.” TOM HEATON:
• Liverpool have been linked to Burnley goalkeeper Tom Heaton.
• The Daily Mail claim the Reds are interested in the shot-stopper although they will reportedly face competition from Aston Villa.
• However, with Simon Mignolet looking set to stay at Anfield it would appear this move is unlikely.

DANI CEBALLOS:
• Liverpool-linked Ceballos joined Arsenal today on a season-long loan.
• Despite numerous reports claiming the Reds were interested in the midfielder, it was unlikely a move would have been made by Klopp. 🔴 #LFC

【FSG欲把Liverpool註冊成商標，利迷狠批「利慾薰心」｜Liverpudlian Ty】
閱讀全文：https://wp.me/p75t7v-77U
利物浦想將 「Liverpool」 呢個字成為註冊商標。球會重申，呢個「只係限於有關足球嘅產品同埋服務」，同埋佢哋唔會將之「全面性」註冊。利物浦表示，作出呢個申請，係要保護球會同埋球迷，以免被通過唔真實嘅產品中獲利嘅人，從中圖利。此舉亦都係想確保，所有使用「Liverpool」嘅服務及產品，其收入會用返喺球會嘅相關事務上，當中包括球員轉會及球場上。
利迷組織Spirit of Shankly 強烈反對 FSG，因為呢個舉動，係公然及明顯地係將球迷嘅足球遺產資本化。佢哋亦都話：「喺呢件事唔只係關乎利物浦呢間球會，呢個係關乎利物浦呢個城市。Liverpool 呢個名字，唔係 FSG 去擁有嘅。呢個係我哋城市嘅名字，係人民所擁有。」

約翰遜拒為批評嘲諷利物浦言論再次公開道歉

英國首相約翰遜（Boris Johnson，另譯莊漢生）在2004年為《Spectator》擔任總編輯時，曾批淮刊出一篇社評文章，內容嘲諷利物浦常常拿希斯堡慘案掛在口邊，伸手向國家拿福利。雖然約翰遜當年曾為此致歉，但在出席日前英國國會答問大會時，卻拒絕再次為此公開道歉。
該文章批評利物浦人的內容大致如下：
「利物浦是一個無法從英國加入歐盟受惠的港口城市，當地人伸手向國家拿福利、一味沉溺在希斯堡慘案的受害者身分。而且，即使希斯堡慘案，是一場較Kenneth Bigley被恐怖份子斬首（編按：2004年，英國工程師Kenneth Bigley在巴格達被恐怖組織Jama'at al-Tawhid wal-Jihad（西方媒體簡稱JTJ，也就是「ISIS」的前身）綁架殺害。）更大的悲劇，但利物浦人迴避比賽當日，他們當中有醉酒球迷造成混亂，所以才釀成慘案的「真相」。無論是執法的警方，抑或是《太陽報》，都只是這一齣悲劇的代罪羔羊。」
